item.description: An item existing only for a decoration purpose.

field.description: Tells if the item kills himself when its animation is finished.

field.name: decorative_item.kill_on_contact
field.description: Tells if the item kills himself when he has a contact.

field.name: decorative_item.shadow.x

field.name: decorative_item.shadow.y
field.description: The offset of the shadow of the item on the y-axis.
